summary.span: 保存篩選條件/資料組的集合，以進行有效率的比對。

span.span: Holds a collection of filter/data pairs for efficient matching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會實作 介面。The implements the interface. 這個篩選資料表已針對宣告式 XPath 篩選條件最佳化，因此資料表索引鍵為 。This filter table is optimized for declarative XPath filters, so the table key is a . 類別會最佳化適用於大部分傳訊案例的 XPath 子集的比對，並且支援完整的 XPath 1.0 文法。The class optimizes matching for a subset of XPath that covers most of the messaging scenarios and also supports the full XPath 1.0 grammar. 它具有最佳化的演算法，能夠有效地進行平行比對。It has optimized algorithms for efficient parallel matching.

value.span: 如果找不到指定的 ，則取得作業會擲回 ，而設定作業會以指定的 做為索引鍵來建立新的篩選資料項目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過下列語法，可以讓 `Item` 屬性 (在 C# 中為索引子) 存取與資料表內篩選條件集合中 `filter` 相關聯的篩選資料。The `Item` property (the indexer in C#) provides the ability to access the filter data associated with a `filter` in the table's filter collection by using the following syntax. ```csharp myFilters[filter] ``` ```vb myFilters(filter) ``` 您也可以使用 `Item` 屬性來加入新項目，方法是設定不存在於動作篩選資料表中之 `filter`/篩選資料組的值。You can also use the `Item` property to add new elements by setting the values of a `filter`/filter data pair that does not exist in the action filter table. 然而，如果 `filter` 已經存在於資料表中，則設定 `Item` 屬性將會覆寫舊值。However if `filter` is already in the table, setting the `Item` property overwrites the old value. 相反地， 方法不會修改現有的 `filter` 的篩選資料。In contrast, the method does not modify the filter data of an existing `filter`. 對於 `Item`，字典 `filter` 則為 /篩選資料組。The dictionary `Item` is a `filter`/filter data pair in the case of .

A compiler error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會實作 。This property implements . 篩選資料表實作的 會使用 做為該組的索引鍵，並使用 `FilterData` 做為該組的值。The that the filter table implements uses the as the key and the `FilterData` as the value of the pair. 雖然集合中傳回之篩選條件的順序並未指定，但其順序一定會與集合中由 `FilterData` 屬性傳回之對應 的順序相同。The order of the filters returned in the collection is unspecified, but it is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding `FilterData` in the collection returned by the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 文件節點的數目上限，這些節點可在單一呼叫 方法期間由個別篩選條件進行檢查。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML document nodes that can be examined by the individual filters during a single call to a method.

summary.span: 這個值適用於每個篩選條件。

span.span: This value applies for each filter.

value.span: 可以檢查之節點的數目。

span.span: The number of nodes that can be examined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用於減緩安全性威脅。This property can be used to alleviate a security threat. 有些篩選條件的評估可能會極耗費資源或費時。Some filters can be extremely expensive to evaluate or are very long-running. 針對來自不受信任來源 (不在線上的 SOAP 訊息) 及可能屬於惡意性質的文件，最常使用 來進行評估。s are most often evaluated against a document from an untrusted source (SOAP message off the wire), which may be malicious. 由於篩選條件是在 XML 文件上作業，因此設定篩選資料表之計算限制的最好方式，就是指定在評估此資料表中篩選條件時所檢查節點的數目上限。Because filters operate on XML documents, the best way to set computational limits on filter tables is to specify the maximum number of nodes that are examined while evaluating a filter in this table.

summary.span: 從篩選資料表移除篩選條件及其相關聯的篩選資料。

summary.span: 檢查篩選條件是否儲存在篩選資料表中。

span.span: Checks whether a filter is stored in the filter table.

returns.span: 如果 存在於篩選資料表中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is present in the filter table; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以有效地檢查篩選條件是否在篩選資料表中，因為當篩選條件不存在時，它會傳回 `false`，而不是擲回例外狀況。This method is an efficient way to check whether a filter is in the filter table because when the filter is not present it returns `false` instead of throwing an exception. 如果您嘗試使用篩選條件的 `Item` 屬性 (在 C# 中為索引子) 從資料表中擷取篩選條件，而該篩選條件卻不在該處時，便會擲回例外狀況。If you try to retrieve the filter from the table using its `Item` property (the indexer in C#) and it is not there, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會實作 。This property implements . 篩選資料表實作的 會使用 做為該組的索引鍵，並使用 `FilterData` 做為該組的值。The that the filter table implements uses the as the key and the `FilterData` as the value of the pair. 雖然集合中傳回之 `FilterData` 的順序並未指定，但其順序一定會與集合中由 屬性傳回之對應篩選條件的順序相同。The order of the `FilterData` returned in the collection is unspecified, but it is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding filters in the collection returned by the property.
